videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns hits ricky Rubio with a nice behind-the-back pass for an easy bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KAT sets up Rubio with slick behind-the-back pass) 2021/5/11 ESHEET

videos.headline: KAT sets up Rubio with slick behind-the-back pass
